title: Does transplanted Posidonia oceanica act as a sink or source of trace elements? Ecological implications for restoring polluted coastal areas
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 359

Author(s): Geraldina Signa, Agostino Tomasello, Giovanna Cilluffo, Cecilia Doriana Tramati, Antonio Mazzola, Sebastiano Calvo, Salvatrice Vizzini
